<@U021H3TV338> <@U6W3H6YN8> <@UQWGKUEN7>

You need a *module* with a table-field and a choice-field, option _ascending_ and _descending_. See Screenshot. Then copy and paste the code below into your module. And in your table you need a _name_ field. Have fun, regards, Mitja.

```
{# Module #}
{#--------------------------------------------------------------------------#}

{% if module.table_id %}
  
{# Table Variables #}
{#--------------------------------------------------------------------------#}
  
{% set table = hubdb_table(module.table_id) %}
{% set table_cols = table.columns %}
{% set table_rows = hubdb_table_rows(module.table_id) %}
{% set col_attr = [] %}
{% set col_type = [] %}
{% set col_label = [] %}
{% set row_id = [] %}
{% set row_label = [] %}
  

{# ~~{ Horizontal Table Layout }~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #}
{# ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #}
 
{% if module.align == 'ascending' %} 
  <table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="5" border="1" id="{{ name }}" class="hubdb ascending">
      <thead>
        <tr>
          
          {# Length #}
          {% set cell_length = table_cols|length + 1 %}
          
          {# Title #}
          <th>{{ table.name }}</th>
          
          {# label #}
          {% for col in table_cols %}
              {% set this = hubdb_table_column(module.table_id, col.id) %}
              {% do col_attr.append(this.name) %}
              {% do col_type.append(this.type|string) %}
              {% do col_label.append(this.label) %}
              <th>{{ this.label }}</th>
          {% endfor %}
          
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
        {% for row in table_rows %} 
          <tr class="{{ row.hs_id }}">
              <th>{{ row.name ? row.name : loop.index }}</th>
              {% for attr in col_attr %}
                {% set type = col_type[loop.index0] %}
                {% set label = col_label[loop.index0] ? col_label[loop.index0] : loop.index %}
                <td  data-label="{{ label }}" data-type="{{ type }}">

                  {# CONTENT DISPLAY #}
                  {{ row[attr] }}<br>
                  <small>{{ attr }}</small>
                  
                </td>
              {% endfor %}
          </tr>
        {% endfor %}
      </tbody>
  </table>
{% endif %}


{# ~~{ Verical Table Layout }~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #}
{# ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #}

{% if module.align == 'descending' %}
  <table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="5" border="1" id="{{ name }}" class="hubdb descending">
      <thead>
        <tr>
          
          {# Length #}
          {% set cell_length = table_rows|length + 1 %}
          
          {# Title #}
          <th colspan="{{ !table_rows[0].name ? cell_length : 1 }}">
             {{ table.name }}
          </th>
          
          {# Label #}
          {% for row in table_rows %}
              {% do row_id.append(row.hs_id) %}
              {% do row_label.append(row.name) %}
              <th class="text-center">{{ row.name ? row.name : loop.index }}</th>
          {% endfor %}
          
        </tr>
      </thead>  
      <tbody>
        {% for col in table_cols %}
            {% set this = hubdb_table_column(module.table_id, col.id) %}
            <tr>
              <th>{{ this.label }}</th>
              {% for id in row_id %}
                {% set row = hubdb_table_row(module.table_id, id) %}
                {% set label = row_label[loop.index-1] ? row_label[loop.index-1] : loop.index %}
                {% set type = this.type %}
                {% set attr = this.name %}
                <td data-label="{{ label }}" data-type="{{ type }}">
 
                  {# CONTENT DISPLAY #}
                  {{ row[attr] }}<br>
                  <small>{{ attr }}</small>
                  
                </td>
              {% endfor %} 
            </tr>
        {% endfor %} 
      </tbody>
  </table>
{% endif %}

{# End #}
{#--------------------------------------------------------------------------#}
  
{% else %}
  <p>Please select a HubDB table</p>
{% endif %}```
